Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: People are actively discussing Australia's 2023-24 Budget and related events and taking to social media to share their thoughts. The posts feature a mix of positive and negative reactions with one group welcoming the Albanese Government's move to increase Paid Parental Leave to 26 weeks strengthen the nation's superannuation system and roll out a new cell broadcast National Messaging System while others are raising concerns about the potential for JobSeeker changes to leave many struggling to get by and the government's hit list on vital regional road safety projects. Events are also being announced including the ACOSS Post Budget Event 2023.
